title: I've seen the Mordekaiser changes on PBE.
body:
Thank you for the early birthday present Riot, as a Mordekaiser player I cannot thank you enough <3

I've dreamt of having bruiser bot being viable ever since I joined the game in S2.

I can now partner up with my support-main fiancé thanks to you, this is one of the best presents I ever had. Buff to Mordekaiser and an attempt to make non-ADC botlane work? Thank you so much !!!!
